static _get_new_vertex(graph: Graph, vertex_type: type[Vertex], timestamp: int) → Vertex[source]

Gets the vertex from the graph by its type and timestamp if exists, otherwise creates a new one.

Parameters:

  • graph (Graph) – graph to get vertex from.

  • vertex_type (type[Vertex]) – vertex type.

  • timestamp (int) – vertex timestamp.

Returns:

vertex.

Initializes the measurement.

Parameters:

  • noise_covariance – covariance of the noise.

  • timestamp – timestamp of the measurement.

  • file_path – path of the file with the measurement.
